actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to authorize the regulation of tobacco products under that Act in the same manner as food is regulated under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to include tobacco products within the definition of food as contained in such Act thereby subjecting such products to the same regulation as food under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to authorize the regulation of tobacco products under that Act in the same manner as food is regulated under that Act.
